name: Solve Puzzle 1
requires: ((|Puzzle Piece 1| AND |Puzzle| AND {requiresNoOptions()})  OR ((|Puzzle Piece 1| AND |Puzzle|) AND ({requiresSolve()} AND {YamlDisabled(Roomsanity)})) OR ((|Puzzle Piece 1| AND |Puzzle|) AND ({YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND {requiresCell()})) OR ((|Puzzle Piece 1| AND |Puzzle|) AND ({requiresSolve()} AND {requiresCell()})

name: Pickup Hint Fragment B
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToVaults()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToVaults()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Pickup Hint Fragment C
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToVaults()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToVaults()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Pickup Hint Fragment D
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()})) )

name: Pickup Hint Fragment E
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND |Hint Fragment D| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Pickup Hint Fragment F
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND |Hint Fragment D| AND |Hint Fragment E| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) ),

name: Pickup Hint Fragment G
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND |Hint Fragment D| AND |Hint Fragment E| AND |Hint Fragment F| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Pickup Hint Fragment H
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND |Hint Fragment D| AND |Hint Fragment E| AND |Hint Fragment F| AND |Hint Fragment G| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Pickup Hint Fragment I
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND |Hint Fragment D| AND |Hint Fragment E| AND |Hint Fragment F| AND |Hint Fragment G| AND |Hint Fragment H| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Pickup Hint Fragment J
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND |Hint Fragment D| AND |Hint Fragment E| AND |Hint Fragment F| AND |Hint Fragment G| AND |Hint Fragment H| AND |Hint Fragment I| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Pickup Hint Fragment K
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND |Hint Fragment D| AND |Hint Fragment E| AND |Hint Fragment F| AND |Hint Fragment G| AND |Hint Fragment H| AND |Hint Fragment I| AND |Hint Fragment J| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Pickup Hint Fragment L
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND |Hint Fragment D| AND |Hint Fragment E| AND |Hint Fragment F| AND |Hint Fragment G| AND |Hint Fragment H| AND |Hint Fragment I| AND |Hint Fragment J| AND |Hint Fragment K| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Pickup Hint Fragment M
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND |Hint Fragment D| AND |Hint Fragment E| AND |Hint Fragment F| AND |Hint Fragment G| AND |Hint Fragment H| AND |Hint Fragment I| AND |Hint Fragment J| AND |Hint Fragment K| AND |Hint Fragment L| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Pickup Fragment Clue
requires: (|Hint Fragment A| AND |Hint Fragment B| AND |Hint Fragment C| AND |Hint Fragment D| AND |Hint Fragment E| AND |Hint Fragment F| AND |Hint Fragment G| AND |Hint Fragment H| AND |Hint Fragment I| AND |Hint Fragment J| AND |Hint Fragment K| AND |Hint Fragment L| AND |Hint Fragment M| AND (({requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()}) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)})) )

name: Reassemble Hint 3
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND {canReassembleHint()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND {canReassembleHint()}) OR ({YamlDisabled(Roomsanity)} AND {requiresGlue()} AND {canReassembleHint()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {requiresGlue()} AND {canReassembleHint()}))

name: Pickup Magnifying Glass
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND |Hint 3|) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint 3|) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND |Hint 3|) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint 3|))

name: Open Trapdoor
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}))

name: Pickup Puzzle Piece 3
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}))
